pages.text: Everyone knows that the spark produced by $(item)$(bold)Flint and Tinder$() does not actually come from the flint, but is actually the result of a tiny piece of steel flaking off and igniting. Everyone also knows that to produce fire from just flint and tinder alone is impossible and a high-carbon tool steel is also required.

We at VFD have a vested interest in your survival, and for that reason, we are now operating under the assumption that the rocks used to make $(item)$(bold)Flint and Tinder$() have a high concentration of carbon.
